name: Ehud Sharlin
content: uTouch ? Home Home U People People C Projects Projects D Publications Publications y Videos Videos Group 2017 The utouch research group is exploring new interactions between people and technology. We are designing new interactive experiences that rely on physical entities and environments. Our main research themes are human-robot interaction, interaction between autonomous vehicles and pedestrians, physical and tangible user interfaces, embodied and ubiquitous computing, computer game interfaces, virtual and mixed reality, and generally HCI and interaction design. The group is part of the University of Calgary's Interactions Lab, supervised by Dr. Ehud Sharlin. Webmaster: Ashratuz Zavin Asha
